Text: Meeting with Dicklunch with Dick It went fine He is fully supportive and onboard Kevin Garland Managing Director Enron Broadband Investments

RE Meeting with Dick and Mikewill set up a meeting with Dick this morning I am scheduled to meet with Mike at KG Kevin Garland Managing Director Enron Broadband Investments Original Message From Lavorato John Sent Monday June AM To Garland Kevin Subject Kevin Im meeting with Dick and Mike at and this morning Ill let yoy know if there are any problems
